casebody.data:
Charles A. BARBARIN, Petitioner-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellee. No. 71-1537

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 9, 1971. Charles Barbarin, pro se. Gerald J. Gallinghouse, U. S. Atty., Patrick C. McGinity, Asst. U. S. Atty., New Orleans, La., for the United States.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and INGRAHAM and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York, et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.1 See Local Rule 21.2

. See Barbarin v. United States, 329 F. Supp. 549 (E.D.La.l971).

. See N.L.R.B. v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
